conclusion: Identify the variables and relationships: R1 = 2Ω, U1 = 4V, R2 = 5Ω, U2 = 5V
Calculate the resistance R of the variable resistor R using Ohm's law: R = V/I = 4V/2Ω = 2Ω
Determine the current I in the circuit: I = V/R = 4V/2Ω = 2Ω
Calculate the electromotive force E of the power source: E = V = I × R = 2Ω × 2Ω = 4V
Determine the internal resistance r of the power source: r = V/I = 4V/2Ω = 2Ω
Summary: Electromotive force E: 4V, Internal resistance r: 2Ω
